abstract: On film, he has looked every bit as bad as his numbers indicate. His lateral agility is gone, as is his stop/start burst and quickness. He appears to be thinking rather than playing.
snippet: On film, he has looked every bit as bad as his numbers indicate. His lateral agility is gone, as is his stop/start burst and quickness. He appears to be thinking rather than playing.

headline.main: More Than a Slump for Titans' Chris Johnson
